entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
